org.jboss.gravia.runtime.embedded.spi

Class BundleAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.gravia.runtime.embedded.spi.BundleAdaptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Bundle>, Bundle

    public final class BundleAdaptor
extends Object
implements Bundle
    Bundle implementation that delegates all functionality to the underlying Module.

    27-Sep-2013
    Author:
    thomas.diesler@jboss.com
